channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Deal alert: Head from the US to Spain from $442 round-trip

item.title: This cruise offer could earn you elite status 4 times faster

item.title: Earn up to 75,000 Air Canada Aeroplan points by donating to Miles4Migrants

item.title: Accor’s Ennismore lifestyle arm partners with Our Habitas resort brand

item.title: Why the Amex Platinum card is best for active-duty military
